mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM T_xinyu_ShipOrder_1109 T where T.FID=#{id}
SELECT T.* FROM T_xinyu_ShipOrder T where T.FID=#{id}

SELECT T.FID,T.FKreceiverInfoID FROM T_xinyu_ShipOrder_1109 T inner join T_xinyu_receiverinfo_1109 i on t.FKreceiverInfoID = i.FID
1=1 and T.Fcu=#{cu} and t.fstatus=#{status} and (t.fstatus='WMS_FINASH' or t.fstatus='WMS_PRINT')
and (t.fstatus='WMS_FINASH' or t.fstatus='WMS_RETURN')
and t.FKuserID=#{userId} and t.FstoreCode=#{storeCode} and t.ForderCode=#{orderCode} and t.FerpOrderCode=#{erpOrderCode} and t.ForderType=#{orderType} and t.FtmsServiceCode=#{tmsServiceCode} and t.FtmsServiceName=#{tmsServiceName} and t.FtmsOrderCode=#{tmsOrderCode} and t.Fremark=#{remark} and t.FextendFields like "%"#{extendFields}"%" and t.FsplitStatus=#{splitStatus} and i.FreceiverProvince like "%"#{receiverState}"%" and (i.FreceiveTown like "%镇" or i.FreceiverAddress like "%镇%" or i.FreceiveTown like "%村" or i.FreceiverAddress like "%村%" or i.FreceiveTown like "%乡" or i.FreceiverAddress like "%乡%") and i.FreceiveTown not like "%镇" and i.FreceiverAddress not like "%镇%" and i.FreceiveTown not like "%乡" and i.FreceiverAddress not like "%乡%" and i.FreceiveTown not like "%村" and i.FreceiverAddress not like "%村%" and t.FtotalWeight=(#{weight}*1000) and t.FtotalWeight >= (#{weight}*1000) and t.FtotalWeight <= (#{weight}*1000)
and (i.FreceiverName like "%"#{searchText}"%" or i.FreceiverNick like "%"#{searchText}"%" or i.FreceiverMobile like "%"#{searchText}"%" or i.FreceiverPhone like "%"#{searchText}"%" or t.FtmsOrderCode like "%"#{searchText}"%" or t.FerpOrderCode like "%"#{searchText}"%" or t.fitems like "%"#{searchText}"%" or T.FbatchCode like "%"#{searchText}"%")
and t.fid in
#{id}
and t.`FlastUpdateTime` > date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and t.`FlastUpdateTime` <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
and t.`fcreateTime` > date_format(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and t.`fcreateTime` <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
and t.fitems not like "%"#{txtno}"%"
order by t.fseq desc
limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM T_xinyu_ShipOrder_1109 T inner join T_xinyu_receiverinfo_1109 i on t.FKreceiverInfoID = i.FID
1=1 and T.Fcu=#{cu} and t.fstatus=#{status} and (t.fstatus='WMS_FINASH' or t.fstatus='WMS_PRINT')
and t.FKuserID=#{userId} and t.FstoreCode=#{storeCode} and t.ForderCode=#{orderCode} and t.FerpOrderCode=#{erpOrderCode} and t.ForderType=#{orderType} and t.FtmsServiceCode=#{tmsServiceCode} and t.FtmsServiceName=#{tmsServiceName} and t.FtmsOrderCode=#{tmsOrderCode} and t.Fremark=#{remark} and t.FextendFields like "%"#{extendFields}"%" and t.FsplitStatus=#{splitStatus} and i.FreceiverProvince like "%"#{receiverState}"%" and (i.FreceiveTown like "%镇" or i.FreceiverAddress like "%镇%" or i.FreceiveTown like "%村" or i.FreceiverAddress like "%村%" or i.FreceiveTown like "%乡" or i.FreceiverAddress like "%乡%") and i.FreceiveTown not like "%镇" and i.FreceiverAddress not like "%镇%" and i.FreceiveTown not like "%乡" and i.FreceiverAddress not like "%乡%" and i.FreceiveTown not like "%村" and i.FreceiverAddress not like "%村%" and t.FtotalWeight=(#{weight}*1000) and t.FtotalWeight >= (#{weight}*1000) and t.FtotalWeight <= (#{weight}*1000)
and (i.FreceiverName like "%"#{searchText}"%" or i.FreceiverNick like "%"#{searchText}"%" or i.FreceiverMobile like "%"#{searchText}"%" or i.FreceiverPhone like "%"#{searchText}"%" or t.FtmsOrderCode like "%"#{searchText}"%" or t.FerpOrderCode like "%"#{searchText}"%" or t.Fitems like "%"#{searchText}"%" or T.FbatchCode like "%"#{searchText}"%")
and t.fid in
#{id}
and t.`FlastUpdateTime` > date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and t.`FlastUpdateTime` <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
and t.`fcreateTime` > date_format(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and t.`fcreateTime` <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
and t.fitems not like "%"#{txtno}"%"

SELECT t.* FROM t_xinyu_shiporder t
1=1
and t.`FlastUpdateTime` > date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and t.`FlastUpdateTime` <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
and not exists( select 1 from t_xinyu_tmsorder m where t.fid = m.FKorderID )
